dooyit.ui

Class UIMessageBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • dooyit.ui.UIMessageBox

  • public class UIMessageBox
extends java.lang.Object
    The UIMessageBox class contains the methods to initialize the message box, control its visibility and set its displayed message.
    Since:
    2016-04-10
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Wu Wenqi

        This is the constructor method.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        This method is used to initialize UIMessageBox class. It is used by the constructor.

      • initMessageLabel

        private void initMessageLabel()
        This method is used to initialize the message label. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initMessageBox

        private void initMessageBox()
        This method is used to initialize the message box view. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initTransitions

        private void initTransitions()
        This method is used to initialize visual transitions for the message box. It is used by the initialize method.

      • update

        private void update(double x,
                    double y,
                    double width,
                    double height)
        This method is used to change the position and dimension of the message box.
        Parameters:
        x - The value to set the x-coordinate of the message box to.
        y - The value to set the y-coordinate of the message box to.
        width - The value to set the width of the message box to.
        height - The value to set the height of the message box to.

      • updateMessageLabelStyleClass

        private void updateMessageLabelStyleClass(UIMessageType msgType)
        This method is used to update the style of the message label.
        Parameters:
        msgType - The UIMessageType to set the style of the message label to.

      • updateMessageLabelSettings

        private void updateMessageLabelSettings(java.lang.String msg)
        This method is used to adjust the duration of the message box's transition, depending on length of the message it is displaying.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message displayed by the message box.

      • isShowing

        protected boolean isShowing()
        This method is used to check if the message box is visible.
        Returns:
        True if message box is visible, False otherwise.

      • updatePosition

        protected void updatePosition()
        This method is used to update the position of the message box.

      • display

        protected void display()
        This method is used to show the message box in the stage of the application scene. It is used by the show method.

      • show

        protected void show(java.lang.String msg,
                    UIMessageType msgType)
        This method is used to show the message box to the user.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message to display to the user.
        msgType - The UIMessageType of the message.

      • tempHide

        protected void tempHide()
        This method is used to temporarily hide the message box.

      • hide

        protected void hide()
        This method is used to hide the message box.

      • isOn

        protected boolean isOn()
        This method is used to retrieve the visibility attribute of the message box.
        Returns:
        True if message box should be visible to user, False otherwise.
